description: Creates an application version for the specified application. You can create an application version from a source bundle in Amazon S3, a commit in AWS CodeCommit, or the output of an AWS CodeBuild build as follows: Specify a commit in an AWS CodeCommit repository with SourceBuildInformation. Specify a build in an AWS CodeBuild with SourceBuildInformation and BuildConfiguration. Specify a source bundle in S3 with SourceBundle  Omit both SourceBuildInformation and SourceBundle to use the default sample application.  Once you create an application version with a specified Amazon S3 bucket and key location, you cannot change that Amazon S3 location. If you change the Amazon S3 location, you receive an exception when you attempt to launch an environment from the application version.
